Leggingss of the Burning Mantle

These indestructible leggings, resembling diamond pants, provide unique protective and utility features:

Grants a permanent 4% magical damage reduction.
Automatically extinguishes flames when you're set on fire. If extinguishing isn't possible, you receive Regeneration instead.
Bestows constant Fire Protection, shielding you from heat-related damage.
Leaves a trail of glowing light behind you, which disappears after a short duration.
These greaves ensure you are well-equipped to face fiery dangers and light up your path as you go!
